articles.title: Hail Mary touchdown overturned as No. 7 Miami survives against Virginia Tech in thriller - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Miami avoided a massive upset thanks to a controversial overturned call on the final play of the game.
articles.content:
Da'Quan Felton appeared to catch the game-winning touchdown for Virginia Tech, but replay showed he dropped the ball in a tough loss to No. 7 Miami. (AP Photo/Marta Lavandier)
